page.title: 19A day in my life
page.content: I get up at 7:20am, wash, dress, and have my breakfast. Then I watch TVAM (breakfast time television programme) until 8:30am when I set off for school. School starts at 8:50am with assembly. Then we have lessons until mid-day with a 15 minute break at 10:45am. I go home for lunch. Lessons begin again at 1:15pm. We have a small break at 2:20pm. At 3:35pm I go home and have my tea. Afterwards I play my records (I like Wham and Shakin' Stevens) and read my pop magazines. At 7:00pm I go down and watch the television or read. Then I have a drink and go to bed at about 9:00pm. I read in bed for about half an hour and then go to sleep. -Sarah Cooke: Penhale Middle School
